search.labelCategory: What kind of event you are looking for?

search.labelDistrict: From where are you looking for?

searchNotification.noResultsTitle: Sorry, no search results were found for the search criteria you selected.
searchNotification.noResultsText: No search results were found for the search criteria you selected. Try to change search terms or change to event search.
searchNotification.fewResultsTitle: Your search terms returned only a few results.
searchNotification.fewResultsText: Your search terms returned only a few results. Try to change search terms or change to event search.
searchNotification.changeLanguageText: Please change your search terms or display results in Finnish. You could also switch to an Events search.
